title: Weekly Roundup: Thursday, September 22
description: Following a week of news focused on policing and national security, Hillary Clinton and Donald Trump gear up for the first Presidential debate of 2016. This episode: host/campaign reporter Tamara Keith, campaign reporter Scott Detrow, campaign reporter Asma Khalid, and editor/correspondent Ron Elving. More coverage at nprpolitics.org. Email the show at nprpolitics@npr.org.
